info.title: 500px
info.description: 500px API provides programmatic access to 500px functionality and content. Version 1 of the API is limited to the essentials of the website's functionality: viewing feature streams, photo information and comments, as well as user profiles.

get.summary: Returns a listing of five recent stories (maximum 100 per page).
get.description: Returns a listing of five recent stories (maximum 100 per page).

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: Story stream to be retrieved. Default fresh. Recognized values:

parameters.name: feature (required)
parameters.description: Story stream to be retrieved. Default fresh. Recognized values:Global featuresfresh

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the story listing. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Return stories by a specific user, as displayed on [http://500px.com/:username/stories][]

parameters.name: body (required)
parameters.description: Content of the blog post.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude for the blog post.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for the blog post.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Photo ID values to post with the blog.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma separated list of tags.

parameters.name: title (required)
parameters.description: Title for the blog post.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Story ID to delete.

get.summary: Returns detailed information of a single story.
get.description: Returns detailed information of a single story.

parameters.name: id (required) - Return information for the specific story.
body
parameters.description: Content of the blog post.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Blog Post ID to update.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude for the blog post.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for the blog post.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Photo IDs for photos that are in the blog post.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma separated list of tags.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title for the blog post.

get.summary: Returns a listing of twenty comments for a specific Story.
get.description: Returns a listing of twenty comments for a specific Story.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Story ID to get comments for.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the comment listing. Page numbering is 1-based.

post.summary: Creates a comment for the Story.
post.description: Creates a comment for the Story.

parameters.name: body (required)
parameters.description: Content of the comment.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Story ID to create a comment for.

get.summary: Returns a listing of all User's collections and sets.
get.description: Returns a listing of all Users collections and sets.

parameters.name: photos_per_collection_limit
parameters.description: The number of photos included in each collection. Can not be over 200, default 200.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Kind of the Collection to be created Recognized values: 1 - Portfolio Set (default), 2 - Profile Set.

parameters.name: path (required)
parameters.description: Path where the collection will be accessible at 500px.com/user/sets/:path.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Photo ID values to post with the blog.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position of the collection in the list of collections.

parameters.name: title (required)
parameters.description: Title for the collection.

parameters.name: image_size - Numerical size of the image to link to, 1 being the smallest and 4 being the largest. Multiple image sizes may be specified as image_size[]=2&image_size[]=4.
id (required)
parameters.description: Collection ID.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Change kind of the Collection. Recognized values: 1 - Portfolio Set, 2 - Profile Set.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path where the collection will be accessible at 500px.com/user/sets/:path.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Photo ID values that are in this collection.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position of the collection in the list of collections.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title for the collection.

post.summary: Creates a reply to an existing comment. Comments can only be nested one level deep, you cannot reply to a reply of a comment. If a comment has a non-null parent_id value then it cannot be replied to.
post.description: Creates a reply to an existing comment. Comments can only be nested one level deep, you cannot reply to a reply of a comment. If a comment has a non-null parent_id value then it cannot be replied to.

parameters.name: body (required)
parameters.description: Content of the comment.

get.summary: Returns a listing of twenty (up to one hundred) photos for a specified photo stream.
get.description: Returns a listing of twenty (up to one hundred) photos for a specified photo stream.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: String name of the category to exclude photos by. Note: Case sensitive, separate multiple values with a comma.

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: Photo stream to be retrieved. Default fresh_today. Recognized values:

parameters.name: image_size
parameters.description: The photo size to be returned. It has to be an integer: 1 to 4. Also an array is accepted:

parameters.name: include_states
parameters.description: If set to 1, returns state of the photo for the currently logged in user and authenticated request.

parameters.name: include_store
parameters.description: If set to 1, returns market infomation about the photo.

parameters.name: only
parameters.description: String name of the category to return photos from. Note: Case sensitive, separate multiple values with a comma.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the photo stream. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 20.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort photos in the specified order.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Control the order of the sorting.  You can provide a sort_direction without providing a sort, in which case the default sort for the requested feature will be adjusted.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: If set to 1, returns an array of tags for the photo.

post.summary: Create a new photo on behalf of the user, and receive an upload key in exchange.
post.description: Create a new photo on behalf of the user, and receive an upload key in exchange.

parameters.name: aperture
parameters.description: Aperture value

parameters.name: camera
parameters.description: Make and model of the camera. Note: Please make sure it contains sensible information (eg., does not contain cameras make or model twice)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A numerical ID for the Category of the photo

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the photo

parameters.name: focal_length
parameters.description: Focal length in millimetres, a string representing an integer value

parameters.name: iso
parameters.description: ISO value

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude, in decimal format

parameters.name: lens
parameters.description: Lens used to make this photo

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude, in decimal format

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Title of the photo

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: Whether to hide the photo from the user profile on the website. Otherwise, the photo is only available for use in Collections/Portfolio. Recognized values: 1, 0.

parameters.name: shutter_speed
parameters.description: Shutter speed in seconds, represented by string containing a rational expression if the value is 1sec.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to apply to the photo.

delete.summary: Deletes the photo from the User's library.
delete.description: Deletes the photo from the Users library.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Photo ID to delete.

get.summary: Returns detailed information of a single photo.
get.description: Returns detailed information of a single photo.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Return comments to the photo in the response. Comments are returned in order of creation, 20 entries per page.

parameters.name: comments_page
parameters.description: Return the specified page from the comments listing. Page numbers are 1-based.

parameters.name: image_size
parameters.description: Numerical size of the image to link to, 1 being the smallest and 4 being the largest.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Returns an array of tags for the photo.

put.summary: Allows the client application to update user-editable information on a photo.nnnResource URLnnhttps://api.500px.com/v1/photos/:idnnnnAuthenticationnnRequired; OAuth. The client application must use the OAuth access token issued for the owner of the p
put.description: Allows the client application to update user-editable information on a photo.nnnResource URLnnhttps://api.500px.com/v1/photos/:idnnnnAuthenticationnnRequired; OAuth. The client application must use the OAuth access token issued for the owner of the photo to access this resouce.nnnParametersnnThe application must provide the ID of the photo to update in the URL of the request. The following parameters are recognized when included in the query string or POST body:nnnnname: Title of the photo, up to 255 characters in length.nndescription: Text description of the photo, up to 65535 characters in length.nncategory: Integer number of the category of the photo. See category mapping for exact values.nntags: Comma-separated list of tags applicable to this photo.nnadd_tags: Comma-separated list of tags to add to this photos existing tags.nnremove_tags: Comma-separated list of tags to remove from this photos existing tags.nnshutter_speed: Shutter speed value for the photo, internally stored as string.nnfocal_length: Focal length value for the photo, internally stored as string.nnaperture: Aperture value value for the photo, internally stored as string.nniso: Integer ISO value for the photo.nncamera: Make and model of the camera used to take this photo.nnlens: Information about the lens used to take this photo.nnlatitude: Latitude of the location this photo was taken at represented by a decimal number.nnlongitude: Longitude of the location this photo was taken at represented by a decimal number.nnnsfw: Boolean value indicating that the photo may contain not-safe-for-work content or content not suitable for minors.nnlicense_type: Integer number of the license type chosen for this photo. See license type mapping for exact values.nnprivacy: Integer value indicating that the photo should be shown (0) or hidden (1) on the users profile.nncrop: A hash containing keys x, x2, y, y2 and representing coordinates within which the thumbnail must be cropped. The crop is made using the top left corner as the origin. The points must be given relative to image size 4, an image of at most 900px on the larger side. The client application may skip this if the user does not wish to change photo thumbnail.nnnnImplementation detailsnnA parameter missing from the request will not be updated.  A parameter set to an empty string or null value will be interpreted as the user wishing to reset the value of the field to its default value.nnYou can use the add_tags and remove_tags parameters to manupulate a photos tags without having to send the complete list of tags in the request.nnnReturn formatnnA JSON object containing key photo, where photo is a Photo object in full format.nnnErrorsnnAll known errors cause the resource to return HTTP error code header together with a JSON array containing at least status and error keys describing the source of error.nnnn401: Invalid OAuth request: The request was refused because the OAuth signature is incorrect.nn404: Photo with ID not found: The photo ID provided is not known to the system.nn404: Photo with ID has been deleted: The photo has been deleted and can not be edited.nn404: Photo with ID belongs to a deactivated user: The photo belongs to a user that is no longer active and can not be edited.nn400: Bad photo category: An unrecognized photo category value has been provided.nn400: Bad license type: An unrecognized license type value has been provided.

parameters.name: add_tags: Comma-separated list of tags to add to this photo's existing tags.
aperture: Aperture value value for the photo, internally stored as string.
camera: Make and model of the camera used to take this photo.
category: Integer number of the category of the photo. See category mapping for exact values.

crop: A hash containing keys x, x2, y, y2 and representing coordinates within which the thumbnail must be cropped. The crop is made using the top left corner as the origin. The points must be given relative to image size 4, an image of at most 900px
description: Text description of the photo, up to 65535 characters in length.
focal_length: Focal length value for the photo, internally stored as string.
iso: Integer ISO value for the photo.
latitude: Latitude of the location this photo was taken at represented by a decimal number.
lens: Information about the lens used to take this photo.
license_type: Integer number of the license type chosen for this photo. See license type mapping for exact values.
longitude: Longitude of the location this photo was taken at represented by a decimal number.
name: Title of the photo, up to 255 characters in length.
nsfw: Boolean value indicating that the photo may contain not-safe-for-work content or content not suitable for minors.
privacy: Integer value indicating that the photo should be shown (0) or hidden (1) on the user's profile.
remove_tags: Comma-separated list of tags to remove from this photo's existing tags.
shutter_speed: Shutter speed value for the photo, internally stored as string.
tags: Comma-separated list of tags applicable to this photo.

get.summary: Returns a listing of twenty comments for the photo.
get.description: Returns a listing of twenty comments for the photo.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Photo ID to get comments for.

parameters.name: nested - Include this parameter to return the comments in nested format.
page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the comment listing. Page numbering is 1-based.

post.summary: Creates a new comment for the photo.
post.description: Creates a new comment for the photo.

parameters.name: body (required)
parameters.description: Content of the comment.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Photo ID to post comments for.

delete.summary: Removes the photo to user's list of favorites.
delete.description: Removes the photo to users list of favorites.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the photo to delete from list of favorites.

post.summary: Adds the photo to user's list of favorites.
post.description: Adds the photo to users list of favorites.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the photo the favorite is cast upon.

get.summary: Returns all users that had favorite that photo.
get.description: Returns all users that had favorite that photo.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the photo stream. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 20.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the photo to report.

delete.summary: Removes tags from the photo. Accepts one or multiple coma separated tags.
delete.description: Removes tags from the photo. Accepts one or multiple coma separated tags.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Photo ID to remove tags from.

parameters.name: tags (required)
parameters.description: Coma separated tags.

post.summary: Adds tags to the photo. Accepts one or multiple coma separated tags.
post.description: Adds tags to the photo. Accepts one or multiple coma separated tags.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: The Photo ID to add tags for.

parameters.name: tags (required)
parameters.description: Coma separated tags.

post.summary: Allows the user to vote for a photo.
post.description: Allows the user to vote for a photo.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the photo the vote is cast upon.

parameters.name: vote (required)
parameters.description: vote, values: 0 for dislike or 1 for like.

get.summary: Returns all users that had liked this photo.
get.description: Returns all users that had liked this photo.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page in the photo stream. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 20.

get.summary: Returns a listing of twenty (up to one hundred) photos from search results for a specified tag, keyword, or location.
get.description: Returns a listing of twenty (up to one hundred) photos from search results for a specified tag, keyword, or location.

parameters.name: comments_count u2014u00a0Sort by the number of comments, most commented first.
created_at
parameters.description: Default: sort by time of upload, most recent first.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: String name of the category to exclude from the results. Note: Multiple categories may be given, separated by commas, e.g. People,Nude

parameters.name: favorites_count
parameters.description: Sort by the number of favorites, most favorited first.

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: A geo-location point of the format latitude,longitude,radius<units>. Acceptable units are km or mi.

parameters.name: highest_rating
parameters.description: Sort by highest rating achieved, highest rated first.

parameters.name: image_size
parameters.description: The photo size to be returned. It has to be an integer: 1 to 4.

parameters.name: license_type -- Restrict the results to one or more license types.  Multiple types can be separated with a comma: license_type=1,4.
only
parameters.description: String name of the category to return photos from. Note: Multiple categories may be given, separated by commas, e.g. Fashion,Black and White

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return a specific page. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Sort by current rating, highest rated first.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 20.

parameters.name: sort u2014u00a0Sort photos in the specified order. The following values are recognized:nnnn_score
parameters.description: Sort by query score, best match first.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A complete tag string to search for.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Returns an array of tags for each photo.

parameters.name: taken_at u2014u00a0Sort by the original date of the image extracted from metadata, most recent first (might not be available for all images).
term
parameters.description: A keyword to search for.

parameters.name: times_viewed u2014u00a0Sort by the number of views, most viewed first.
votes_count u2013 Sort by the number of votes, most voted on first.

post.summary: This is a new photo upload endpoint. It is currently in beta.nCreate a new photo on behalf of the user and upload a file.nfile parameter is passed in multipart/form-data, other parameters are passed as query parametrs or multipart/form-data.
post.description: This is a new photo upload endpoint. It is currently in beta.nCreate a new photo on behalf of the user and upload a file.nfile parameter is passed in multipart/form-data, other parameters are passed as query parametrs or multipart/form-data.

parameters.name: aperture
parameters.description: Aperture value

parameters.name: camera
parameters.description: Make and model of the camera. Note: Please make sure it contains sensible information (eg., does not contain cameras make or model twice)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A numerical ID for the Category of the photo

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the photo

parameters.name: file (required)  - Photo filename in JPG/JPEG, passed along with multipart/form-data.
focal_length
parameters.description: Focal length in millimetres, a string representing an integer value

parameters.name: iso
parameters.description: ISO value

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude, in decimal format

parameters.name: lens
parameters.description: Lens used to make this photo

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude, in decimal format

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Title of the photo

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: Whether to hide the photo from the user profile on the website. Otherwise, the photo is only available for use in Collections/Portfolio. Recognized values: 1, 0.

parameters.name: shutter_speed
parameters.description: Shutter speed in seconds, represented by string containing a rational expression if the value is 1sec.

post.summary: Allows an application to upload the photo file.nnNote that this endpoint is at the upload.500px.com domain, not the api.500px.com domain.
post.description: Allows an application to upload the photo file.nnNote that this endpoint is at the upload.500px.com domain, not the api.500px.com domain.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The multipart HTTP upload. This is expected to be of the same format as when a file is being sent from an HTML file form.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: The ID of the photo the file is being uploaded for. The ID should be known to the client from the POST photos request result.

get.summary: Returns the profile information for the current user.
get.description: Returns the profile information for the current user.

get.summary: Returns a list of users who follow the specified user.
get.description: Returns a list of users who follow the specified user.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return the specified page of the resource. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: Results Per Page, default 20, max 100.

delete.summary: Removes the user from the list of followers.
delete.description: Removes the user from the list of followers.

get.summary: Returns a list of friends for the specified user.
get.description: Returns a list of friends for the specified user.

parameters.name: id (required)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return the specified page of the resource. Page numbering is 1-based.

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: Results Per Page, default 20, max 100.

post.summary: Add the user to the list of followers.
post.description: Add the user to the list of followers.

parameters.name: id (required)
parameters.description: ID of the User to add to the followers list.

get.summary: Return listing of ten (up to one hundred) users from search results for a specified search term.
get.description: Return listing of ten (up to one hundred) users from search results for a specified search term.

parameters.name: term (required)
parameters.description: A keyword to search for.

get.summary: Returns the profile information for a specified user.
get.description: Returns the profile information for a specified user.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Return information for the user with the specified email address.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Return information for the specified user ID.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Return information for the user with the specified username.
